about: Our squeeze ball for hand strength helps you stay focused, calm, uplift your mood while strengthening your hand grip. The stress balls for adults and kids are perfect for squishing and squeezing as a sensory toy.

Our hand strengthener fidget toy combines squishy texture with a flexible finger strap that keeps the ball on your finger so you can keep squishing the hand exercise ball. A great stress relief toy for kids, teens, and adults!

The hand trainer foam stress balls are made using squishy gel with a smooth fabric cover to offer the right balance of quality, comfort, and softness so you can keep squishing the hand therapy ball throughout the day.
Each hand strengthening ball is designed with a motivational and inspirational quote that also serves as a stress relief toy to keep training fun, making it a perfect gift for loved ones of all ages.

products.title: Massage Seat Cushion
products.subTitle: with Heat Back Massager Heated Seat Cover with 5 Vibrating Massage Nodes & 2 Heat Levels Massage Chair Pad for Pain Relief Home Office Use
about: ULTIMATE COMFORT: The heated massage seat cushion has 5 vibration motors providing ultimate comfort for long trips and extended sitting with home and car adapters. (Note: This is Vibrating massage, not Shiatsu Massage with Rolling Balls)
SOOTHING HEAT: The seat warmer with auto shut-off targets the full back and seat, radiating gentle warmth. It is also equipped with an overheating protection system with dual insurance for safe use.

PERFECT GIFTS: Our Back Massager Heated Seat Cover is a perfect gift for Father's Day, Mother's Day, or for Dad, Mum, friends, wife, husband, or any loved ones. Suitable for various occasions, it can be used at home, in the office, etc.
CUSTOMIZE SETTING: The seat massage cushion features 4 vibration modes targeting 4 areas (Upper back, Lower back, Hips, and Thighs), 2 intensity levels, and an individual Heat on/off button.

products.title: Mindsight 'Breathing Buddha'
products.subTitle: Guided Visual Meditation Tool for Mindfulness
about: WHAT IT'S FOR: Daily guided breathing to help calm and focus your mind during the day or promote a peaceful night's sleep, improving overall wellness. Continued practice can help manage or reduce stress and anxiety in all ages and can help improve symptoms of depression. A simple and fun meditation tool that can also cultivate mindfulness to help you live in the present moment.

HOW TO USE IT: Two easy-to-use modes with fade-in, fade-out color prompts that simulate the popular 4/7/8 or 5/5 'calming breath'. Green Buddha - Inhale, Purple Buddha - Hold, Blue Buddha - Exhale. Lightly tap on the surface to adjust brightness.

WHO IT'S FOR: Adults and kids who might benefit from a gentle daily reminder to 'pause and reset'; visual learners who might prefer guided open-eyed meditation (those who find closing their eyes harder to focus); beginning to advanced meditation practitioners; those interested in mindfulness; teachers and counselors.

products.title: experiment Dot Journaling
products.subTitle: A Practical Guide: How to Start and Keep the Planner, To-Do List, and Diary That'll Actually Help You Get Your Life Together
about: Anyone who needs a practical resource for getting his or her life in order will fit it with Miller's step-by-step guide to Dot Journaling. -- 'Atlanta Journal-Constitution'

If you've never experimented with bullet journaling, this set provides an excellent foray into the art form, namely because it comes with a comprehensive how-to guide. . . . Great quality. -- 'The Spruce'
It covers everything (seriously, everything) you could ever want to know about organizing your life into one simple journal. -- 'Apartment Therapy'
This book . . . will actually help you get your life together.
